reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress stylish with a pretty pattern, comfortable in hot weather, and well-constructed. They like the pockets, with one customer noting they fall below the waist, and appreciate the color options. The fabric quality receives mixed feedback, with some praising the material while others find it cheap. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it spot on while others say it runs large. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Versatile and Comfortable
items.body: So, so cute and I love the flowy fabric. The colors and pattern are exactly as pictured. It is lightweight, but not sheer. You could wear this to a spring or summer wedding, to lunch with friends or to the beach. It's very versatile. I plan to order more colors/patterns. Fit was right on. Read more
items.author: TawnyBee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value!!
items.body: It has a great flow, pockets, perfect length, comfortable, washes and drys well. I wear the dress with sandals or sneakers and looks cute either way. The seam quality is sturdy, easy to wear- dress it up with nice sandals or flats or dress it down with sneakers and a fun sporty ponytail and great value!! Read more
items.author: Janice B

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Style, quality, colors
items.body: Colors are pretty & pockets are nice. Nice length. Fits more like a nightgown, no shape, no flow, no style. I wanted this to take on a cruise for excursions, dinning, etc. but will not wear it for that. Might use as a bathing suit coverup. Will not order any more Read more
items.author: janet miller

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pretty!
items.body: Great fit, comfortable, soft material, fade and shrink resistant colors, very pretty. Looks exactly like the picture. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this purchase
items.body: Absolutely LOVE! Very comfortable and super cute! It’s thin but not see-thru so it’s perfect for hot summer days/nights. I’m 5’3” about 124lbs and the small was perfect. It’s loose fitting and “flowy”. I’m a 34 C in the bust and this size was a little more fitted in that area but not tight. Label says “dry clean recommended”, but I washed in the washer and hung to dry. No prob. It’s mainly cotton so IMO no need for dry cleaning. Arrived quickly. Very pleased with this purchase. Read more
items.author: gp

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tight fit on top
items.body: Dress was too small in chest and armholes and I have a small chest. Dress was shipped without tags and scrunched into a ball in a small plastic bag and appeared to have been worn and returned to them and shipped out again. It is disappointing when items received aren’t packaged like the new ones. Read more
items.author: Marcia P

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice addition to the closet
items.body: I only leave honest reviews on products! I was skeptical about this dress. The reviews were good and I ordered the version with vertical stripes. For the price I paid, it is a tremendous value. The photo is a little off in terms of color, but I love the version I received. The fabric does not look cheap. It doesn't have that shiny, slinky look that synthetic fabrics can have. It washes and dries beautifully. It looks and feels like cotton jersey or a cotton-poly blend. The pockets are great and the cut is very nice. The armholes are small enough to cover my bra. The fabric is similar to a medium weight T-shirt. True to size!!! Read more
items.author: Ohio_Momof4

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent dress
items.body: Pretty, light, pockets, nor sheer. So comftable.I am 5’3” and was just ave the knee. No washing instructions- I washed on cold, delicate and line dried and came out perfect and wrinkle free. Read more
items.author: William C Gray

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black White Flower, Ba Bohemian Stripe, Ba Vintage Print, Black/White, Blue White Gradient, Black Boho Floral, Blue White Boho, Blue Black Flower, Black Pink Floral, Haze Blue, Black Floral Leaves, Blue Yellow Boho, Ba Purple, Black Rainbow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
